name: Companion
description: Companion. The all-in-one investment & trading application designed to help ordinary people safely make money when trading and investing. Owned by the user, each AI NFT companion will bond & help guide its user to grow and protect their money. By getting to know the user's goals, investment experience & risk tolerance, the companion tailors an investment strategy based on the user's shared information. Our suite of in-house proprietary algorithms & investment strategies gives the user actionable steps on what to buy, when to buy it, and when to take their profits. Join us on our mission to save humans from financial ruin
